articles.title: How the Trump administration's move will affect Harvard's international students
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Donald Trump's administration escalated its standoff with Harvard University on Thursday, revoking the school's ability to enroll international students.

articles.title: Trump administration blocks Harvard University from enrolling foreign students

articles.author: Yahoo Sport Australia
articles.title: White House pauses plans for President Trump's commission on college sports as congressional leaders discuss legislation
articles.description: Nick Saban, who could have helped lead the commission, questioned its necessity earlier this month.
articles.content:
The White House has decided to wait before making an official foray into college sports.
Plans for a presidential commission on college sports co-led by former Alabama head coach Nick Saban have been paused, Yahoo Sports' Ross Dellenger reported Thur... [2795 chars]

articles.author: BreakingNews.ie
articles.title: Martin warns over prospect of ‘extremely disruptive’ 50% US tariff on EU goods
articles.description: The Taoiseach said the announcement from US President Donald Trump came as a “surprise”.
articles.content:
US president Donald Trump’s threatened 50 per cent tariff on all EU imports would cause extreme disruption to the global economy, the Taoiseach has warned.
Micheál Martin said the move by Mr Trump had come as a “surprise”, noting that the EU was enga... [2596 chars]

articles.author: BreakingNews.ie
articles.title: Japanese PM urges investment, not tariffs, after call with Trump
articles.description: Shigeru Ishiba said Japan’s position to press Washington to drop all recent tariffs is unchanged.
articles.content:
Japan’s Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba has said he held telephone talks with US President Donald Trump and agreed to hold “productive” discussions at an upcoming tariff talks between the two sides.
“Investment, not tariffs,” Mr Ishiba told reporters a... [1426 chars]
